If you are renting or staying in an apartment in Austria, Wohnrechtsvereinbarung (Right of Residence Agreement) is a legal contract that confirms your residential rights. This document is essential for visa renewal, university registration, and financial applications.

ğŸ”— Download the Sample Contract: House Contract (Wohnrechtsvereinbarung)

âœ… What is a Wohnrechtsvereinbarung?

âœ”ï¸ A contract between the landlord/tenant (Accommodation Provider) and the resident (Tenant).
âœ”ï¸ Confirms that the resident has legal rights to stay at a specific address.
âœ”ï¸ Required for visa extensions, Meldezettel (address registration), university admissions, and financial purposes.

ğŸ“Œ Key Sections of the Contract

1ï¸âƒ£ Personal Information of Both Parties

  • Accommodation Provider (UnterkunftgeberIn)
    âœ”ï¸ Full Name
    âœ”ï¸ Date of Birth
    âœ”ï¸ Address
    âœ”ï¸ Contact Information

  • Resident (UnterkunftnehmerIn)
    âœ”ï¸ Full Name
    âœ”ï¸ Date of Birth
    âœ”ï¸ Address
    âœ”ï¸ Nationality

2ï¸âƒ£ Address of Residence

âœ”ï¸ Full address (Street, House Number, Staircase, Floor, Door Number).
âœ”ï¸ Must match the address on the Meldezettel (address registration document).

3ï¸âƒ£ Duration of the Agreement

âœ”ï¸ Start Date (Von) and End Date (Bis) of the stay.
âœ”ï¸ The contract cannot be canceled at any time, but only with a one-month notice period.

4ï¸âƒ£ Details of the Accommodation

âœ”ï¸ Size of the apartment (in square meters).
âœ”ï¸ Number of rooms in the residence.
âœ”ï¸ List of all residents (if sharing).

5ï¸âƒ£ Cost of Accommodation

âœ”ï¸ Monthly Rent Amount (â‚¬) (if applicable).
âœ”ï¸ â€œUnentgeltlichâ€ (Free Stay) â€“ If no rent is charged.
âœ”ï¸ The landlord must attach a copy of the rental contract or property ownership documents.

6ï¸âƒ£ Signatures & Official Approval

âœ”ï¸ Both the Accommodation Provider & Resident must sign the contract.
âœ”ï¸ Date & location must be included in the contract.
âœ”ï¸ A copy of the rental agreement or property ownership proof must be attached.

ğŸ“Œ Why is Wohnrechtsvereinbarung Important?

PurposeRequirement
Visa RenewalMust submit a valid Wohnrechtsvereinbarung as proof of accommodation.
University EnrollmentRequired by some universities for permanent accommodation proof.
Tax & Finance ApplicationsNeeded for registering a bank account, FinanzOnline, or tax-related matters.
Police Registration (Meldezettel)Confirms your official residence in Austria.

ğŸ“ Where to Submit Wohnrechtsvereinbarung?

âœ”ï¸ For Visa Applications: Submit to MA35 (Immigration Office).
âœ”ï¸ For Meldezettel Registration: Submit at your local Magistrat (City Office).
âœ”ï¸ For Employer or Financial Use: Provide a copy when opening a bank account or registering for FinanzOnline.

âœ”ï¸ Keep a copy of the signed contract for your records.
âœ”ï¸ If you are staying without a rental contract, ensure your Wohnrechtsvereinbarung states â€œUnentgeltlichâ€ (Free Accommodation).
âœ”ï¸ The accommodation provider must be the legal tenant or owner of the residence.
